emulator.core.memory

Class Memory

  • java.lang.Object
    • emulator.core.memory.Memory

  • public class Memory
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the 16K memory core
    Author:
    Daniel Simpkins

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Memory(java.lang.String bios, java.lang.String rom)
      Loads the bios into first bank, then loads rom into the rest.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • Memory

        public Memory(java.lang.String bios,
              java.lang.String rom)
        Loads the bios into first bank, then loads rom into the rest.
        Parameters:
        bios - Path to bios file.
        rom - Path to rom file.

    • Method Detail

        Writes a byte into memory.

      • dump

        public boolean dump(java.lang.String filename)
        Dumps the entire internal memory into a binary file.
        Parameters:
        filename - Name of the file to write to.
        Returns:
        True if dump was successful.
